Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.comcard

Class CommonObjCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.comcard.CommonObjCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonObjCard extends Object implements Serializable
CommonObjCard class represents the common objective cards of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonObjCard

      public CommonObjCard(int numberOfPlayers, int type) throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
      Constructor for CommonObjCard. It is based on how many players will play the game because the points provides by CommonObjCard instance is different.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - number of players in a match
      type - the type of CommonObjectiveCard
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if number of players entered is less than two or more than four

    • CommonObjCard

      public CommonObjCard(int numberOfPlayers, int type, String description) throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
      Constructor for CommonObjCard. It is based on how many players will play the game because the points provides by CommonObjCard instance is different.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - number of players in a match
      type - the type of CommonObjectiveCard
      description - the card's description taken from the json file
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if number of players entered is less than two or more than four.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public int getType()
      Method getCommonObjCardDescription returns a string with the description of this card -- Maybe this method must be edited in function of JSON loading strings
      Returns:
      commonObjCardDescription

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints() throws InvalidPointerException, OutOfBoundsException
      Method getPoint returns the points for this card based on what order the players has reached the goal.
      Returns:
      objPoints[objLength - 1]
      Throws:
      InvalidPointerException - if the array length is zero
      OutOfBoundsException - if all the points for the objective card are taken

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      get method
      Returns:
      String -> description

    • doCheck

      public int doCheck(Player player) throws InvalidPointerException
      doCheck method controls if the condition for distributes points subsist.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Returns:
      the points obtained iff conditions of the commonObjCard subsists for the parameter player
      Throws:
      InvalidPointerException - if there are no points to be drawn

    • copyPointsArray

      public int[] copyPointsArray()
      copyPointsArray copy the points configuration of objPoints array in temp array. the configuration is chosen by the number of players of the game.
      Returns:
      int[] -> temp

    • getNextPoints

      public int getNextPoints()
      get method
      Returns:
      int -> nextPoints
